title: The fair maid of the vvest. Or, A girle worth gold. The first part. As it was lately acted before the King and Queen, with approved liking. By the Queens Majesties Comedians. Written by T.H.
author: Heywood, Thomas, d. 1641.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Richard Royston, and are to be sold at his shop in Ivie Lane,
